item.title: Logging Framework
item.description: Overview The following two open source projects are used to process log messages, 1. https://github.com/sirupsen/logrus 2. https://github.com/natefinch/lumberjack Logrus is a structured logger for Go (golang), and completely API compatible with the golang standard library logger. Note that logrus doesn’t support log rotation, and it is exactly the reason why we introduce the second project lumberjack, which provides a rolling logger.
